mapper.select: select * from faq order by faq_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into faq(faq_no, faq_category, title, writer, content) values(#{faq_no}, #{faq_category}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update faq set title=#{title}, faq_category=#{faq_category}, content=#{content} where faq_no=#{faq_no}
